__e: Listen, this is a great house. You should buy it.
It's a great house, plenty of room, and if we have kids, Mom's there to help.
Lorraine, you are a beautiful woman with a lot to offer.
Well, that's quite a girl you've got there.
She's a great girl, you know. I hope she's okay.
You're a great girl and I have to tell you something.
-You have no idea what a great life is.
You know, I think our son's going to have a wonderful life.
That your young life will, of course, include me.
While she lasted. Good few months. We were great together, you know?
I think you and me, we make a great couple.
Probably not what you want to hear, but I thought you were a great couple.
I think we've made a jolly good team here, you and I?
I've got a great team behind me and I'm loving it.
You know, we make a great team, you and I. You are such a day-saver.
Don't tell your dad I was here, all right?
I appreciate you not saying anything to your dad about me being there... but why aren't you telling him what a great game you played?
Everybody in the circle. Just get in the circle! Everybody together.
